settings.content:
True Health Starts In Your Dog’s Gut.

DigestiveK9 is the most comprehensive, science-backed, vet recommended gut health supplement you’ll find for dogs - supporting digestion, skin, energy, and behaviour.

If your dog is struggling with gas, loose stools, itching, bad breath, low energy, anxiety or poor coat condition, it’s likely their gut microbiome is off balance and needs support.

settings.heading: Product Description
settings.content:
DigestiveK9 is a multi-action daily gut health supplement, designed to support digestion, immunity, skin and nervous system for dogs of all life stages and breeds.

Most dog supplements only target one piece of the puzzle. DigestiveK9 combines amino acids, digestive enzymes and a unique blend of Pre, Para-Pro and Postbiotics to support the WHOLE of the gut - available in a simple scoop of powder sprinkled right over their regular food or in a convenient chew. Always consult your veterinarian for specific advice for your dog.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: Larch Arabinogalactan, Organic Spirulina, Oatstraw, Bio-K9® (Fermented pre, para-pro and postbiotic blend containing Lactobacillus acidophilus D2, Saccharomyces cerevisiae, Carrot fibre), L-Glutamine, Pineapple Bromelain, Organic Beef Liver, Organic Ginger, Green Lipped Mussel.

settings.heading: How To Use
settings.content:
Slowly introduce DigestiveK9 over 14 days

  • Days 1–4: ¼ daily serve
  • Days 5–8: ½ daily serve
  • Days 9–13: ¾ daily serve
  • Day 14 onwards: full serve

Daily serve recommendations:

  • ¼ scoop per 5kg of body weight.

Sprinkle powder over food (add a splash of water if feeding kibble).

For best results, feed daily and increase gradually to allow your dog’s gut to adjust.

settings.heading: Auto-Ship & Save
settings.content:
With Auto-Ship, you never have to worry about running out when you need it most.

You’ll receive your chosen quantity of DigestiveK9 at your chosen frequency.

You’ll also save 10% off the price with every single delivery and receive free shipping. Those savings add up, especially if you have multiple dogs.

You can cancel or edit your Auto-Ship service at any time.

settings.text_kuxtJt6VwAUJeBkZ: 70% of your dog’s immune system is in the gut, and the latest research links gut health to behaviour, skin, and overall vitality.
settings.text_Gw1F4nPrXB9ANF8Z: unlocking calmer behaviour, healthier skin, and a happier, more resilient dog.
settings.text_OO9eDlQgGrgDSjrm: calmer behaviour, healthier skin, and a happier, more resilient dog.
settings.text_flPtzItxoDpUle0P: Try DigestiveK9 today to see the change in your dog.

settings.text_ZWzdu8D6ymlO7ePr:
DigestiveK9 was developed in collaboration with veterinarians, microbiologists and canine health specialists to provide complete gut support for dogs.

Each serve contains Bio-K9® - a unique Pre, Para-Pro and Postbiotic blend to support digestion, immunity and nervous system health.
settings.text_CNiopHDM5uQC6f1Z: A gum derived from the Larch tree and a gentle source of fibre that feeds good gut bacteria, supports your dog’s immune system and helps manage upset tummy symptoms like diarrhoea.
settings.text_USq3AfYLLJp5xFaZ: A nutrient-rich algae packed with antioxidants that supports gut lining and overall health. Naturally high in digestive-friendly vitamins, minerals & amino acids.
settings.text_6vxBB4oVVDYKPtmF: A calming, medicinal herb which is extracted from the non-grain part of the oat plant. Helps soothe the gut by relieving mucous membrane irritation and supports a balanced nervous system. It is also rich in minerals, supporting bone health and overall vitality.
settings.text_OyZerS1bi3wPcHiq:
Bio-K9 is our proprietary blend of Carrot, Burdock Root, Sprouted Pea Fibre and Yeast Derived Prebiotics, fermented with Lactobacillus acidophilus D2 and Saccharomyces cerevisiae. 

It’s one of the most powerful gut health formulas available for dogs.
settings.text_oqQasz24Chx2sEad: An amino acid that helps repair and protect the gut lining, boosting immune cell activity which is helpful during times of stress.
settings.text_VxuWW2g42HdbTh0Y: A natural enzyme that aids digestion, helps reduce inflammation while assisting in breaking down proteins and reducing bloating & constipation symptoms, and has natural antihistamine properties.
settings.text_b0jCNoHqPI1a2jPx: A tasty source of protein, high in iron and B vitamins that supports energy, immune health and promotes healthy skin.
settings.text_HP9By2vP5UvBOWhM: An anti-microbial super ingredient, ginger helps calm the stomach, soothes nausea, helps relieve gas/flatulence and supports overall healthy digestion.
settings.text_Q4ANv5WHGOgNutBR: A rich source of marine omega-3s that help to reduce inflammation throughout the body, including in the joints and gums.

settings.text_SwBdURWJjSbrBxhY:
Stick with it. Great gut health takes time. Most dogs show their best results around the 3 month mark, so don’t give up early.

Consistency is the key to lasting change.

settings.text_vtUUcfBFwKLLW1VP:
We believe good gut health goes beyond probiotics alone. That’s why DigestiveK9 is formulated with postbiotics - proven, stable actives that work where your dog needs it most.

While probiotics can struggle to survive digestion, postbiotics get to work throughout the entire gut, supporting your dog from nose to tail. Because lasting results come from looking after the whole gut, not just part of it.
settings.text_MJ92sjiBZMdIqide: Safe Daily Support For All Breeds & Ages.

settings.text_LIza5s7HmZN9Fk8l: Don't just take our word for it. Hear it from our regular customers.

settings.text_mkqKG2FCjguvkRUP: Poseidon Animal Health was founded in Australia in 2017, with a focus on targeted, evidence-based gut health solutions. After creating our successful equine range, we applied that same science-led approach to canine health.We are based in the Illawarra Region of NSW, with manufacturing facilities in Australia, New Zealand and USA. We also export to Europe, the Middle East and Asia.
settings.text_hy0VeA18a8uuHqZ2: DigestiveK9 is a daily gut health supplement formulated by a team of canine nutritionists, microbiologists and veterinarians to support the entire digestive tract.DigestiveK9 is designed to support digestion, immunity, skin health, and behaviour.
settings.text_0eV7hQJP6sDOqMP7:
DigestiveK9 stands apart in three key ways:

  • It uses a powerful blend of prebiotics, postbiotics, para-probiotics, amino acids and digestive enzymes - developed using a unique canine-specific culture.
  • It contains no synthetic additives or artificial preservatives - only active, non-GMO ingredients that support the whole gut.
  • Our Bio-K9® blend is fermented using Lactobacillus acidophilus D2 to deliver stable, shelf-ready metabolites that help calm inflammation and support the immune system.
settings.text_1eWIERvISZMoonPb: DigestiveK9 Powder includes our Bio-K9® blend along with organic spirulina, green lipped mussel, oat straw, organic ginger, glutamine, beef liver, and pineapple bromelain for added gut and immune support.
settings.text_lQVrouAzFcMx65MD:
We recommend daily use to support your dog’s gut and overall wellbeing. DigestiveK9 is safe for all dog breeds and life stages and is designed to be used as a long-term supplement solution, so there’s no need to worry about having to wean your dog off the product and find issues return.

Modern diets, stress, medications, and environmental toxins can all impact the gut microbiome. If your dog displays signs of digestive upset, itchy skin, bad breath, food sensitivities, or low energy, it could indicate poor gut health.DigestiveK9 helps restore balance, reduce inflammation, and support better digestion, immunity, and behaviour - every day.
settings.text_vs8pW4tj98PZFF5X:
Powder Daily Feed Rate

Feed ¼ scoop of powder per 5kg of body weight.

*If your dog is between weights, it is safe to round up. For example, a 7kg dog would receive ½ scoop per day.

Introduction

Introduce slowly over 14 days, starting with ¼ of the recommended serve and increasing gradually. For dogs under 5kg, begin with a light sprinkle of powder.

While some dogs show changes quickly, best results are typically seen after 6-12 weeks of daily use.
settings.text_dyJNykgQkFLmfbhe:
Yes! DigestiveK9 is highly palatable. Many owners report their dog won’t eat without it! The powder blends easily with your dog's regular food and is loved by even by the fussiest eaters.

It is extremely rare, but if your dog happens to show any hesitation or disinterest in consuming our supplements after 1 week of daily feeding attempts, please reach out to our customer service team for helpful advice and further support. We’re here to help with your dog's journey to better health.
settings.text_zCa5tADIGvHdBcJ1: Can I Use It With Other Supplements?
settings.text_1A8iLXlb1rGQrGdb:
DigestiveK9 is safe to use alongside most other supplements.Each ingredient plays a specific role, and the formulation is designed to complement your dog’s existing routine.

As with any supplement, we recommend consulting your veterinarian, particularly if your dog is on existing medication or has a medical condition.DigestiveK9 contains no chicken and is suitable for dogs with common protein sensitivities.
